main event: A ground visual observation of a bright red object with trails over Clear Lake, California on 04/23/52.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5 seconds from approximately 30,000 yards away., The description noted that the object had a tail approximately one mile long., The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting., The object was seen moving in a northerly direction., No aircraft were present in the area during the sighting.
witness description: James W. Weiderhold, MSgt, USAF, DFC
